sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CheckForDuplicateNavigationSectionDest</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>check if navigation section destination is already mapped to navigation section</description>
        <name>CheckForDuplicateNavigationSectionDest</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CheckForDuplicateNavigationSectionDest = Class.create();
CheckForDuplicateNavigationSectionDest.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getCheck: function() {
        var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_navigation_section");
        var destForSection = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_sg_navigation_section_m2m_destination");
        if (!gr.canRead()) {
            MobileMessageUtil.addSecurityErrorForTable('sys_sg_navigation_section_m2m_destination');
            return "true";
        }

        gr.addQuery('navigation_section', sysId);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            destForSection.push(gr.getValue('navigation_section_destination'));
        }

        var destSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_navigation_section_destination");
        var manySysId = destForSection.join();
        if (manySysId.indexOf(destSysId) == -1)
            return "false";
        return "true";
    },

    type: 'CheckForDuplicateNavigationSectionDest'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-03-04 14:46:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6b178b965b170010a175309fb681c795</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CheckForDuplicateNavigationSectionDest</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6b178b965b170010a175309fb681c795</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-25 05:30:23</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1016</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
